channel.title: CVE Feed for Elvaco -- M-Bus Metering Gateway CMe3100
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Elvaco -- M-Bus Metering Gateway CMe3100

item.title: CVE-2024-49399|2024-10-17T16:56:24.149Z -- elvaco -- m-bus%20metering%20gateway%20cme3100
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to an attacker being able to use commands without providing a password which may allow an attacker to leak information.

item.title: CVE-2024-49396|2024-10-17T17:51:54.610Z -- elvaco -- m-bus%20metering%20gateway%20cme3100
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable due to insufficiently protected credentials, which may allow an attacker to impersonate Elvaco and send false information.

item.title: CVE-2024-49397|2024-10-17T17:51:47.925Z -- elvaco -- m-bus%20metering%20gateway%20cme3100
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to a cross-site scripting attack which may allow an attacker to bypass authentication and takeover admin accounts.

item.title: CVE-2024-49398|2024-10-17T17:51:38.915Z -- elvaco -- m-bus%20metering%20gateway%20cme3100
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to unrestricted file uploads, which may allow an attacker to remotely execute code.

item.title: CVE-2024-49398|2024-10-17T16:17:31.423Z -- elvaco -- m-bus%20metering%20gateway%20cme3100
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to unrestricted file uploads, which may allow an attacker to remotely execute code.

item.title: CVE-2024-49397|2024-10-17T16:15:14.508Z -- elvaco -- m-bus%20metering%20gateway%20cme3100
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to a cross-site scripting attack which may allow an attacker to bypass authentication and takeover admin accounts.

item.title: CVE-2024-49396|2024-10-17T16:12:21.215Z -- elvaco -- m-bus%20metering%20gateway%20cme3100
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable due to insufficiently protected credentials, which may allow an attacker to impersonate Elvaco and send false information.

item.title: CVE-2024-49399|2024-10-17T16:19:47.991Z -- elvaco -- m-bus%20metering%20gateway%20cme3100
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to an attacker being able to use commands without providing a password which may allow an attacker to leak information.
